info.title: Component Identifier Service API
info.description: API for the IHTSDO Component Identifier Service.

post.description: Creates a session, obtaining a token for next operations.
Closes a session, identified by the token.
Validates a token, checking if it' assigned to a current session, and retrieves user data.

get.description: Returns the list of available namespaces.
Returns the list of available schemes.

post.description: Adds a User to a Group.

delete.description: Removes a user from a Group.

get.description: Returns list of users with access to this namespace.

post.description: Creates a permission for this namespace, allowing access for the provided user.

delete.description: Deletes a permission for this namespace, removing access for the provided user.

get.description: Returns list of users with access to this namespace.

post.description: Creates a permission for this Scheme, allowing access for the provided user.

delete.description: Deletes a permission for this Scheme, removing access for the provided user.

put.description: Updates the partitionId sequence for this namespace.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The next value in the sequence.

get.description: Returns the list of available namespaces.
Returns the required SCTID Record, identified by the systemId.

parameters.name: namespaceId
parameters.description: The required namespace that contains the SystemId.

post.description: Generates a new SCTID, based on the metadata passed in the GenerationData parameter. The first available SCTID will be assigned. Returns a SCTID Record with status 'Assigned'

Registers a SCTID already in use in an external system, based on the metadata passed in the RegistrationData parameter. Returns a SCTID Record with status 'Assigned'. If the SCTID is already assigned it will return an error.

Reserves a SCTID for use in an external system, based on the metadata passed in the ReservationData parameter. The first available SCTID will be reserved. Returns a SCTID Record with status 'Reserved'.

put.description: Deprecates a SCTID, so it will not be assigned to any component, based on the metadata passed in the DeprecationData parameter. Returns a SCTID Record with status 'Deprecated'.
Releases a SCTID, so it will available to be assigned again, based on the metadata passed in the DeprecationData parameter. Returns a SCTID Record with status 'Available'.
Sets the SCTID as published, based on the metadata passed in the DeprecationData parameter. Returns a SCTID Record with status 'Published'.

parameters.name: sctids
parameters.description: The required sctids list, separated with commas (,).

get.description: Returns the required SCTID Records by SystemIds.

parameters.name: systemIds
parameters.description: The required systemIds list, separated with commas (,).

post.description: Generates news SCTID, based on the metadata passed in the GenerationData parameter. The first available SCTIDs will be assigned. Returns an array of SCTIDs Record with status 'Assigned'
Registers SCTIDs already in use in an external system, based on the metadata passed in the RegistrationData parameter. Returns an array of SCTID Records with status 'Assigned'.

Reserves SCTIDs for use in an external system, based on the metadata passed in the ReservationData parameter. The first available SCTIDs will be reserved. Returns an array of SCTID Records with status 'Reserved'.

put.description: Deprecates SCTIDs, so they will not be assigned to any component, based on the metadata passed in the DeprecationData parameter. Returns an array of SCTID Records with status 'Deprecated'.
Releases SCTIDs, so they will be available to be assigned again, based on the metadata passed in the DeprecationData parameter. Returns an array SCTID Records with status 'Available'.
Sets the SCTIDs as published, based on the metadata passed in the DeprecationData parameter. Returns an array SCTID Records with status 'Published'.

get.description: Returns the required SchemeId Record, identified by the systemId.

post.description: Receives a request for a Generating a new SchemeId.
Receives a request for a registering existing SchemeIds.
Receives a request for a reserving a SchemeId.

put.description: Receives a request for deprecating a SchemeId.
Receives a request for releasing a SchemeId.
Receives a request for publishing a SchemeId.

parameters.name: schemeIds
parameters.description: The required schemeIds list, separated with commas (,).

post.description: Receives a request for a Generating a new SchemeId.
Receives a request for a registering existing SchemeIds.
Receives a request for a reserving a SchemeId.

put.description: Receives a request for deprecating a SchemeId.
Receives a request for releasing a SchemeId.
Receives a request for publishing a SchemeId.

role.description: name of the role (consumer or manager)

systemId.description: The systemId, optional, a reference to an existing ID on the user environment, external to this API

software.description: The name of the software sending the request, mandatory

comment.description: A comment about the action, optional.
